title: FURNISHED Spacious 2BR 2BATH Condo in Downtown Stamford
map_address: Strawberry Hill Ave near Hoyt St
posting_body: ['Available in September', '$2950 discount for first 3 months; $3250 going forward', 'CONDO:', 'SIZE 1275sf', 'Generous and spacious open floor layout flooded with light in well managed building at a great location!', 'LIVING ROOM/ FAMILY ROOM', 'Brightly lit room with large windows and hardwood floor', 'Furnished with couch, sofas and table, side table, TV stand/ bookcase, rug', 'DINING ROOM', 'Cozy room with large window, hardwood floor and pendant light', 'Furnished with a glass dining table with four chairs', 'OFFICE AREA', 'Open area adjacent to living room with hardwood floor', 'Furnished with a large computer desk with chair, generous cabinet', 'KITCHEN', 'Warm toned space with plentiful cabinets, pantry and counter space with tile floor', 'Range oven, Stove, Refrigerator, Dishwasher, Microwave', 'MAIN BEDROOM', 'Large room and window with private bath and multiple closets', 'Furnished with a queen size bed and side tables', 'MAIN BATHROOM', 'Tiled floor bathroom with a shower', 'Medicine cabinet, below sink cabinet, shelf and towel bar', 'SECOND BEDROOM', 'Bedroom with a large window, hardwood floor and generous closet', 'Furnished with full size bed, dresser, glass desk', 'BATHROOM', 'Tiled bathroom with a bathtub', 'Large medicine cabinet, below sink cabinet, towel bar, hand held shower head', 'COAT CLOSET', 'Hanging and shelf', 'BROOM CLOSET', 'Hanging and shelf', 'ENTRY', 'Bench, mail table and coat hanger', 'BUILDING:', 'GYM', 'Equipped gym and yoga room available', 'DOORMAN', 'Available 7am-12am to pick up packages and deliveries', 'LAUNDRY', 'Two laundry rooms with plentiful washers and dryers available for 24/7 use', 'COVERED PARKING', 'Assigned covered parking spot available', 'GUEST PARKING', 'Free guest parking for three nights available at upper deck', 'SUPERINTENDENT', 'Superintendent living in the building available to assist', 'NIGHT SECURITY', 'Available 12am-7am', 'COMMUNITY ROOM', 'Organized events by building and can be booked for events', 'OUTDOOR TERRACE', 'Furnished with tables, chairs, umbrellas, grilling area', 'STORAGE', 'Additional storage space in basement available', 'BIKE STORAGE', 'Designated bike room available', 'NEIGHBORHOOD:', 'TRANSPORTATION', 'Train station, bus stop in front of building', 'LEISURE', 'Restaurants, coffee shops, Palace theater, movie theaters', 'SHOPPING', 'Stamford mall, Target, Stop and Shop', 'SCHOOLS', 'Stamford High school across the street, playgrounds', 'PARKS', 'Scalzi Park, Mill River Park', 'ACTIVITIES', 'Farmers market, yoga and zumba in the park, outdoor concerts, movie screenings', 'Please provide brief information about yourself when reaching out.', 'We look forward to introducing you to your new home!']
